features: Universal TV Wall Mount - Fits for most 13-43” LCD/LED/OLED flat screen or curved TVs, eaily holds up to 55lbs, max VESA/mounting holes spacing of 200*200mm, 200*100mm, 100*100mm, 100*200mm, 75*75mm, ideal for most tv mounting or monitors, our fixed tv mount works for common TV/Monitor leading brands like SAMSUNG, SONY, LG, VIZIO, TCL, ELEMENT, SCEPTRE, HISENSE , etc.

Slim & Chic Design - Low-profile design holds your TV only 0.9" from the wall, for a modern finished look. This flat screen TV wall mount comes with an open wall plate to accommodate for extra cables and room for an outlet directly behind your mounted TV. Single wood stud provides a clean perfect center mount. Ideal for bedroom, study room, open kitchen, etc.

Safe & Security - Constructed with premium steel materials and durable powder coated finish, this small tv wall mounts use advanced welding technology to ensure stability and safety by testing to hold 1.5 times more weight than its grade suggests. Safety screws lock your TV firmly while the tightening double-hook prevents from TV accidental sliding.

Easy Mount it in 15 Minutes - Every detail of the installation is perfect, free and flexible. Simple and intuitive design makes installation easy. All mounting hardware and instructions are included, just bring your tool and ready for mounting it ! You can choose to install your TV on a 8” wood stud or fix it with two sturdy bolts on a single stud, but avoid drywall alone.

Let it Mount Your Leisure Life - Use it as a monitor tv wall mount to clear up desktop space and for ergonomic computer screen installation to improve your posture and helps you get the best seat in the house and achieve the perfect TV viewing angle. This wall mount tv bracket is designed to the last and backed by reliable after-sale service, limited-lifetime replacement pledge and free technical support. Any questions please feel free to contact us at any time.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: This Nuyoah Universal Flat-Panel TV Low-Profile Wall Mount creates nearly flush, close-to-the-wall installations that enhance thin, modern TV silhouettes when viewing locations and TV heights are optimized. It showcase high-performance LCD, LED, or plasma TVs in residential, office, classroom, etc.
Previous page Next page 1 Purchase Tips 2 1. TV Size and TV Weight 3 2. TV VESA 4 3. Wall Types

Mount your TV for optimal visibility & simplicity with the Basic TV Wall Mount. Wall mounting is the best solution to keep your tv out of reach from children and pets to minimize the risk of tip-over accidents.

TV is positioned just 0.9" from the wall for a clean, low-profile appearance. The tv bracket is almost invisible thanks to its low profile design. Greatly saving space, smart solution for everyday use.

Sturdy dual hook and anti-falling gap design add extra security to your TV. This TV wall mount also comes with a locking mechanism with a quick release which easily secures your TV to the wall. Lateral adjustments let TVs be repositioned after mounting.

Multiple TV Mount Brackets Choice Provided ! reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple, sturdy, 3 piece design
reviews.reviewText: If all you want to do is hang your smallish TV flat on the wall without all the fancy tilt and twist complications of other designs, this one fills the bill.Pros:* Simple, light 3 piece design.* Surprisingly well constructed and finished.* Fits all standard modern TV bracket mounting patterns, including 100 x 100.* Lots of adjustablility for both TV and wall mount options.* Comes with standard screws for the TV mount, in case you no longer have those that came with it.* Brain-dead simple to install. Screw the mount to the wall; hang the TV.Cons - none, actually.It's refreshing to find a simple design that does a basic job well at a good price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024

reviews.reviewText: Es sencillo y practico . Lo recomiendo .

reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not much room for adjustment
reviews.reviewText: It barely worked for my 42" and there's not much adjustments left to right so better mount it exactly where you want it.
